UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The C-terminal stretch of glycine-rich proline-rich protein (SbGPRP1) from Sorghum bicolor serves as an antimicrobial peptide by targeting the bacterial outer membrane protein.
Literature.Author: Roy S, Agarwal T, Das A, Halder T, Upadhyaya G, Chaubey B, Ray S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis MTCC 1305(MIC=7µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 1305(IC50=4.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli MTCC 0040(MIC=75µg/ml),Escherichia coli MTCC 0040(IC50=44µg/ml),Rhodococcus fascians MTCC 0907(MIC=23µg/ml),Rhodococcus fascians MTCC 0907(IC50=12µg/ml)
